title: Conversion rates for RP are f***Ed
body: Anyone find it annoying that they have to purchase $20 of RP or use their debit visa card twice to get enough RP to purchase a skin or name change at 1350 or 1300, all the most recent skins these days are 1350 rp, what's the point of even having $10 RP cards in store, I remember when the server first came out or when I played on NA, I'd stop by EB games after school buy $10 RP and get a sick 1350 skin like Dragon Tamer LuLu, fkin rip riot
